level.text: The holder of a certificate to train nurse aides shall submit to the LTCA an annual report in accordance with procedures setout by LTCA.
LTCA shall re-evaluate a nurse aide training program at least annually or more frequently if deemed necessary by LTCA.
LTCA shall make unannounced visits to review and assess each nurse aide training program to ensure that the program is in compliance with sections 3201-3212.
The LTCA shall assess each nurse aide training program on the basis of visits to the facility, the progress of the nurse aide training program, and any other information deemed appropriate by LTCA.
